plist.dict:
{{- $workflow := .Workflow}} {{- $browsers := .Browsers}} {{- $metadata := .Metadata}} bundleid {{$workflow.BundleID}} category {{$workflow.Category}} readme {{$workflow.Readme}} webaddress {{$workflow.URL}} version {{$workflow.Version}} createdby {{$workflow.Author}} description {{$workflow.Description}} disabled
name {{$workflow.Name}} connections
{{- range $b := $browsers }} {{- $m := index $metadata $b.ID }} {{$m.BookmarkListID}}
destinationuid {{$m.BookmarkOpenID}} modifiers 0 modifiersubtext
vitoclose
{{$m.ProfileSetID}}
destinationuid 6A6D5564-63F4-425C-A21B-58A66B090B74 modifiers 0 modifiersubtext
vitoclose
{{$m.ProfileListID}}
destinationuid {{$m.ProfileSetID}} modifiers 0 modifiersubtext
vitoclose
{{- end -}}
objects
{{- range $b := $browsers }} {{- $m := index $metadata $b.ID }}
config
browser {{$b.FullName}} spaces
url {query} utf8
type alfred.workflow.action.openurl uid {{$m.BookmarkOpenID}} version 0
config
alfredfiltersresults
argumenttype 0 escaping 126 keyword {{$b.Name}} queuedelaycustom 3 queuedelayimmediatelyinitially
queuedelaymode 0 queuemode 1 runningsubtext Searching bookmarks… script QUERY=$(./bin/normalise -form NFC "{query}")
./bin/{{$workflow.AppName}} bookmarks "{{$b.Name}}" -query="${QUERY}" scriptargtype 0 scriptfile
subtext Start typing to search bookmarks… title {{$b.Description}} bookmarks '{query}' type 0 withspace
type alfred.workflow.input.scriptfilter uid {{$m.BookmarkListID}} version 0
config
alfredfiltersresults
argumenttype 1 escaping 126 keyword {{$b.Name}}-profiles queuedelaycustom 3 queuedelayimmediatelyinitially
queuedelaymode 0 queuemode 1 runningsubtext Searching profiles… script QUERY=$(./bin/normalise -form NFC "{query}")
./bin/{{$workflow.AppName}} profiles "{{$b.Name}}" -query="${QUERY}" scriptargtype 0 scriptfile
subtext Show all available profiles title {{$b.Description}} profiles '{query}' type 0 withspace
type alfred.workflow.input.scriptfilter uid {{$m.ProfileListID}} version 0
config
concurrently
escaping 127 script QUERY=$(./bin/normalise -form NFC "{query}")
./bin/{{$workflow.AppName}} select-profile "{{$b.Name}}" -query="${QUERY}" scriptargtype 0 scriptfile
type 0
type alfred.workflow.action.script uid {{$m.ProfileSetID}} version 0
{{- end -}}
config
lastpathcomponent
onlyshowifquerypopulated
removeextension
text {query} title {{$workflow.Name}}
type alfred.workflow.output.notification uid 6A6D5564-63F4-425C-A21B-58A66B090B74 version 0
